UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Characterization of NK-lysin A, a potent antimicrobial peptide from the zebrafish Danio rerio
Literature.Author: Ortjohann M, Leippe M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6051(MIC=1.25µM),Bacillus megaterium ATCC 14581(MIC=0.039µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 12600(MIC=>10µM),Escherichia coli D31(MIC=1.25µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 10145(MIC=10µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=1.25µM),Vibrio anguillarum(MIC=0.625µM)
